attributes.action: End Covid restrictions for all new Coronavirus variants found
attributes.additional_details:
Coronavirus is here to stay. Like all other viruses, the human race will have to learn to live with it. 
We cannot beat the virus. The vulnerable have been vaccinated and further restrictions will damage business, deny people NHS treatment and extend the unlawful denial of basic freedoms.
attributes.background: The Government have stated we will have to live with Coronavirus but are acting as if we can't by reviewing current restrictions every time a new variant is found. The latest example being the tightening of restrictions due to the Omicron variant.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592632
